Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 2012-13 Household Member Recode Data

Source: R/PKPR61.R
PKPR61.Rd

PKPR61 data of Household Member Recode from Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 2012-13.

hhid

Case Identification

hvidx

Line number

hv000

Country code and phase

hv001

Cluster number

hv002

Household number

hv003

Respondent's line number (answering Household questionnaire)

hv004

Ultimate area unit

hv005

Household sample weight (6 decimals)

hv006

Month of interview

hv007

Year of interview

Date of interview (CMC)

Day of interview

Number of visits

Region

Place of residence
